column1: #Text=Butakha says : " There are my little hard - working street urchins .
#Text=Here 's your winnings from the last match .
#Text=First , you owe me for the Avatar 's new gear , gym and equipment rentals from last month , rent on your apartment , and a personal loan for groceries .
#Text=" Butakha says : " Oh , and one more small item of business : The Fire Ferrets need to ante up thirty thousand yuans for the championship pot .
#Text=You got 'til the end of the week to come up with the dough , or else , you 're out of the tournament .
#Text=" Bolin says : " You would n't happen to have a secret Avatar bank account overflowing with gold , would you ?
#Text=I 've always had people taking care of me .
#Text=" Mako says : " Then I would n't say you have nothing .
#Text=" Korra says : " Sorry , I did n't mean — " Bolin says : " No , it 's all right .
#Text=It 's just ever since we lost our parents , we 've been on our own .
#Text=" Mako says : " So , anyway , how are we gon na come up with the money ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh , oh , I got it !
#Text=I 've been training Pabu to do circus tricks .
#Text=Now people would pay good money to see that !
#Text=" Mako says : " Do n't worry about it .
